name: Bhagya Shree
overview:
We embarked our journey in the year 1994, and since then, have been gloriously moving forward under the guidance and support of Mr Suresh Chitale. His business insight and capabilities have helped us in gaining the certification of ISO 9001:2008 and establish our credibility. He envisaged the potential of Automobile industry of the world which helped us expand our base from India to various countries like Europe, USA, Brazil, Australia, Argentina, Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong.

Product Portfolio: Our name is recognised by the leading players in the engine building industry we are consistent in delivering a quality assured range of centrifugal lube oil cleaners. We use quality raw material & latest technology to manufacture our products which are available to our clients in standard & customised specifications.

Our Services: Besides, manufacturing centrifugal oil cleaners, we also offer professional retrofitting services to our valued clients. Our skilled technical experts are capable of executing retrofitting services for old diesel engines with adeptness and precision.

Application Areas: Our wide range of centrifugal oil cleaners are extensively used in the following industries:

Marine Industry
DG sets
Heavy Earth Moving Equipments
Oil & Gas

Our Manufacturing Facilities: We have the state-of-the-art manufacturing unit located at Narhe Industrial Area, in Pune. Our manufacturing facility is spread over an area of 10,000 sq. ft. and is equipped with modern machinery.
